caption.title: The levels of IFN-γ, TNF-α, IL-4 and IL-10 in serum.
caption.p: RVC, rotavirus control group; RDSL, low dose of resveratrol dry suspension group (3mg/kg/day); RDSM, medium dose of resveratrol dry suspension group (10mg/kg/day); RDSH, high dose of resveratrol dry suspension group (30mg/kg/day); MI, mock infected group. * Represents significant difference compared with the RVC group, P < 0.05. + Represents significant difference compared with the MI group, P <0.05.
